title: Airhawk: star of the north
creator_credit: David Baker, Colin Eggleston, Ron McLean and Ron McLean Productions
brief_description: Jim Hawk, outback pilot and adventurer, is wanted by a group of international diamond dealers. When he starts investigating his brother’s murder, Hawk finds himself on the hit list. Conspiracy and murder follow him from Hong Kong to the Gold Coast and then to outback Queensland, as Hawk struggles to uncover the ringleaders and avenge his brother’s death. Based on the cartoon series created by John Dixon the film stars Eric Oldfield and Louise Howitt.
